item.title: Suspect charged in UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson's killing
item.description: Luigi Mangione, the suspect in the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, is now charged with murder in New York City.

item.title: Suspect in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing charged with murder in New York, court records show
item.description: Court records show New York prosecutors have charged a man with murder in the fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO.

item.title: Franklin Fire forces evacuations in Malibu as red flag warnings continue
item.description: The fire has already burned more than 850 acres of brush, firefighters said.
